title: MS Ping Issues
body: I just came out of a match with a bad result but the ping on my match kept going between 125 to 525 and often stood at around 375. Is anyone else having ping problems?

replies.body: It sounds like your connection to the game server is struggling pretty bad.  Run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help clear this up.  You can also run a traceroute to see if your ISP is running into any snags while reaching us by downloading [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and tracing to 104.160.131.1.  Run it for a few minutes and let me know what you find.
